tamdem.title: Flying, a dream!

description.desktop: Everyone has looked at the sky dreaming of flying... With us, it's possible! Every day of the year, professional pilots make your dream a reality. Flights take off from Les Ruinettes or Croix de Cœur. After 20 to 25 minutes of an unforgettable flight, your pilot will land you at Le Châble, from where you'll never look at the sky the same way again.
description.mobile: Want to fly? With us, it's possible! Every day, professional pilots make your dream come true. Departure from Les Ruinettes or Croix de Cœur, for 20-25 minutes of unforgettable flight to Le Châble.

tamdem.description_box: Upon request, the pilot will take photos and videos.

who_are_we.title: Who are we?
who_are_we.description: Our team includes 2 instructors. Sébastien Bruchez (nicknamed 'soleil') and myself, Nicolas Terrettaz. But that's not all, we also have another instructor, Yael Margelisch. This whole cheerful team is here to make your dream of FLYING a reality.

description.desktop: From first flight to license, you'll be supervised by a team of professionals. In a relaxed atmosphere, you'll benefit from instruction adapted to your level to progress safely! Package for the complete training (stage1 + stage2): 2300.- CHF
description.mobile: From first flight to license, supervised by pros in a cool atmosphere. Complete training (stage1 + stage2): 2300.- CHF

stage1.title: Stage 1
stage1.desktop: This stage lets you discover paragliding basics. It includes two half-days at training slope, one pedagogical tandem flight for first flight experience, a theory session before your first solo flight, and finally, your very first autonomous flight! Flight equipment and transport are included in the price of 490 CHF.
stage1.mobile: Discover paragliding basics: 2 training slope sessions, 1 tandem flight, theory, and your 1st solo flight! Equipment and transport included. 490 CHF.

stage2.title: Stage 2
stage2.desktop: With this stage, you get unlimited radio-guided flights until you obtain your license, to be completed within 18 months from registration. A minimum of 50 flights are required, and flight equipment is included for the first 15 flights. This complete program is offered at 2000 CHF (transport not included).
stage2.mobile: Unlimited radio-guided flights over 18 months until license. Min. 50 flights required. Equipment included for 15 flights. 2000 CHF (excl. transport).
